scripts.prod_game_create: yarn build && NODE_ENV=prod node dist/index.js game create
scripts.prod_game_update: yarn build && NODE_ENV=prod node dist/index.js game update
scripts.prod_game_delete: yarn build && NODE_ENV=prod node dist/index.js game delete
scripts.dev_game_create: yarn build && NODE_ENV=dev node dist/index.js game create
scripts.dev_game_update: yarn build && NODE_ENV=dev node dist/index.js game update
scripts.dev_game_delete: yarn build && NODE_ENV=dev node dist/index.js game delete
scripts.prod_genre_create: yarn build && NODE_ENV=prod node dist/index.js genre create
scripts.prod_genre_update: yarn build && NODE_ENV=prod node dist/index.js genre update
scripts.prod_genre_delete: yarn build && NODE_ENV=prod node dist/index.js genre delete
scripts.dev_genre_create: yarn build && NODE_ENV=dev node dist/index.js genre create
scripts.dev_genre_update: yarn build && NODE_ENV=dev node dist/index.js genre update
scripts.dev_genre_delete: yarn build && NODE_ENV=dev node dist/index.js genre delete
